bibl.title: Letter from Anne Rumbaugh to Emilie Lawrence Reed, May 31, 1927

div1.p: This letter, written by a student of Edith R. Force, thanks Emilie Lawrence Reed for the life and work of Walter Reed.

div1.head: Letter from Anne Rumbaugh to Emilie Lawrence Reed, May 31, 1927
div1.p:
I am writing this letter
to show my appreciation of
the sacrifice your husband
made that mankind might live.

I have heard that the
Reed Hospital has been dedicated
in honor of your husband.

I feel, personally, that I
could never thank the people
who make sacrifices for
their country.

It is my hope that someday
I may do something for man-
kind.
div1.closer:
Sincerely yours, Anne Rumbaugh
2003 East 15 St.
Tulsa Oklahoma 9a1
